info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Thomas Loveday

publications.text: Loveday, T. (2010). Epigone: A Critical Approach to History and Theory for Interior Architecture Design Teaching. ConnectED 2010 2nd International Conference on Design Education, Sydney: University of NSW (UNSW).
